name: Blocking Cubes
description:
---------- Developper's message ----------

I made this game to learn how to use Unity and I've never updated it since.

I also made an Android build of the game, it is better than the PC build, but I have not published it on the Play Store yet.

Maybe one day I will update this game to make it look better.

------------------------------------------------

> Story

The blue cylinder is rolling, but the red cubes are trying to block him !

Save him for as long as you can !

> How to play

Press one of the key to reverse the position of all the cubes of the corresponding row.

  • Cubes outside the ground will go into the ground.
  • Cubes into the ground will go out of the ground.

Every cube of the line needs to be into the ground to avoid touching the cylinder.

If the cylinder touch one of the cubes, you lose.

The goal is to get the highest score possible.

> Controls

(from Left row to Right row)

  • Normal Mode :
    • D | F | J | K
  • Hard Mode :
    • S | D | F | J | K | L
  • Impossible Mode :
    • S | D | F | G | H | J | K | L
